Li-PO Battery¶

class components.battery.Battery(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Battery.py is a file which automatically generates a battery part depending on parametric input of battery weight, or battery capacity. Also maximum allowed width and height of the battery can parameterized to enable the typical use-case of setting the width and height to be equal to that of the payload module to obtain a coherent inner fuselage structure.

Returns:

ParaPy Geometry of the Battery(s)
Parameters:
  • sizing_target (basestring) – Accepts either ‘capacity’ or ‘weight’ and sizes based on required capacity on the former
  • sizing_value (float) – The sizing value corresponding to the current target
  • max_width (float) – Sets the maximum allowed width of the battery in SI meter [m]
  • max_height (float) – Sets the maximum allowed height of the battery in SI meter [m]
center_of_gravity[source]¶

Location of the battery center of gravity w.r.t the origin.

Returns:Location Tuple in SI meter
Return type:Point
component_type[source]¶

This attribute names the component ‘battery’ for Battery.

Returns:Name of the Battery
Return type:str
constants[source]¶

This attribute contains the battery constants.

Returns:Dictionary With Battery Constants
Return type:dict
internal_shape[source]¶

The geometry of the component that will be placed inside a structure, (i.e in a wing or fuselage)

Return type:parapy.geom
radius[source]¶

Defines the radius in a way that prevents the battery_profile from self-destructing.

Return type:float
total_energy[source]¶

This attribute calculates the required battery total energy.

Returns:Battery Energy in Watt Hours
Return type:float
volume[source]¶

This attribute calculates the Battery Volume.

Returns:Battery Volume
Return type:float
weight[source]¶

Total mass of the battery.

Returns:Mass in SI kilogram
Return type:float
